message.body: Sorry to bother you again but would you have 40 or 60 I could borrow til Friday??
I'm so sorry, Shelley... Not only am I brokebrokebroke, but i'm also in AZ.
No problem sweetie and thank you. Be safe out there :-) xoxo
Can you please send me Rich's #
Hey. My phone died. Just got charged. Still need it?
No thank you. I found it and just got home from being stranded all day. I'm exhausted and have to walk to work in the morning so I'm taking a shower and going
to bed. Thanks for everything xoxo

Sorry about your day...
Goodnight. Talk to you soon.
